00018 /*
00019  * cfs cname - 1.3
00020  */
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <rpc/rpc.h>
00023 #include <sys/time.h>
00024 #include <ctype.h>
00025 #include "nfsproto.h"
00026 #include "admproto.h"
00027 #include "cfs.h"
00028 
00029 /* following are never used - just so i can re-use the library */
00030 int validhost;
00031 char zerovect[]={0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0};
00032 int cursecs=0;
00033 
00034 char *gets();
00035 
00036 main(argc,argv)
00037      int argc;
00038      char **argv;
00039 {
00040         char *pw;
00041         char pword[256];
00042         char *getpassword();
00043         cfs_admkey k;
00044         cfskey kt;
00045         char *flg;
00046         char estr[1024];
00047         char *cstr;
00048         int i;
00049         int ciph=CFS_THREE_DES;
00050         int verb=0;
00051         
00052         fprintf(stderr,"WARNING: cname works only on old format CFS dirs\n");
00053         while (--argc && (**++argv == '-')) {
00054                 for (flg= ++*argv; *flg; ++flg)
00055                         switch (*flg) {
00056                             case 'v':
00057                                 verb++;
00058                                 break;
00059                             case '1':
00060                                 ciph=CFS_STD_DES;
00061                                 break;
00062                             case '3':
00063                                 ciph=CFS_THREE_DES;
00064                                 break;
00065                             case 'b':
00066                                 ciph=CFS_BLOWFISH;
00067                                 break;
00068                             case 'm':
00069                                 ciph=CFS_MACGUFFIN;
00070                                 break;
00071                             case 's':
00072                                 ciph=CFS_SAFER_SK128;
00073                                 break;
00074                             default:
00075                                 fprintf(stderr,"usage: cname [-3bmsv]\n");
00076                                 exit(1);
00077                         }
00078         }
00079         if (argc!=0) {
00080                 fprintf(stderr,"Usage: cname [-13bmsv]\n");
00081                 exit(1);
00082         }
00083         if ((pw=getpassword("Key:"))==NULL) {
00084                 fprintf(stderr,"Can't get key\n");
00085                 exit(1);
00086         }
00087         strcpy(pword,pw);
00088         k.cipher=ciph;
00089         if (old_pwcrunch(pw,&k)!=0) {
00090                 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid key\n");
00091                 exit(1);
00092         }
00093         copykey(&k,&kt);
00094         kt.smsize=LARGESMSIZE;
00095         if (((kt.primask=(char*) malloc(kt.smsize)) == NULL)
00096             || ((kt.secmask=(char*) malloc(kt.smsize)) == NULL)) {
00097                 fprintf(stderr,"No memory\n");
00098                 exit(2);
00099         }
00100         genmasks(&kt);
00101         while (fgets(estr, sizeof(estr), stdin) != NULL) {
00102                 if (estr[strlen(estr)-1] == '\n')
00103                         estr[strlen(estr)-1] = '\0';
00104                 cstr=decryptname(&kt,estr);
00105                 if (verb)
00106                         printf("%s -> ",estr);
00107                 if ((cstr!=NULL) && printable(cstr))
00108                         puts(cstr);
00109                 else
00110                         puts("???");
00111         }
00112 
00113 }
00114 
00115 int printable(s)
00116      char *s;
00117 {
00118         while (*s)
00119                 if (!isprint(*s++))
00120                         return 0;
00121         return 1;
00122 }
